features.title: Handle simultaneous input combinations like moving and shooting at the same time without conflicts or performance issues
Core Gameplay: Enemy spawning, movement, and collision detection (Player vs Enemy, Bullet vs Enemy)
Enemy Variations: Regular, Zigzag, and Fast enemies with different behaviors and scores
Progression: Score tracking and increasing difficulty (spawn rate/speed) over time
UI: Main Menu, Game Over Screen, and HUD
Visuals: Parallax background, Screen shake, Particle explosions, and Glow effects
